title: Cute film. But on prime as "it's a zoo in here"
review: Watched this movie under a different name on Amazon prime. It was called "It's a zoo in here" but it is the same movie.

title: Lovely movie
review: This is a wonderful film. I haven't seen it since I was in Middle school. I wish they could have it put on Netflix again. Great and enjoyable family film for all ages.
